NG0855:0: [(]11[)]@#/  / gan du+u sa ta ma hang yang kur ya kur ka te /
NG0855:1: ku she la li mo ta pa ra mo /
NG0855:3: ka tang ka gang po dza la ni /
NG0855:5: ko shwa bi shwa la i sa na pad+ma ka
NG0855:6: ma kun da ro tsi ga ta tsi ta sti
NG0855:7: / dz+wa bi s+t+ra ban d+ha he ru ka badzra
NG0855:8: ma rang sa na sa ra pa mun ka mun
NG0855:10: trang stang ka yang dza ya ba ge dong bi
NG0855:11: ka ra be ra ma ra ma ha tsi ti
NG0855:12: ya sang sa ra ma ha ru na dza la
NG0855:13: pa ni ho ho ro na ro hum hum /
NG0855:15: he he ra na ro bzhi la bstod /
NG0855:17: ba ba ti ka pa ra man dzu gri na dza la pa ra ho /
NG0855:19: a+om phur bu spa ti spa to /
NG0855:20: a+om phur bu bash+ta sham ka phur phub ti to phur bu ba sba sar tang */
NG0855:21: byin gyis brlabs pa a+om a sha hum sa ma ya bag k+sha hum bi sha hum /
NG0855:22: sa ma ya bag k+sha hum /
NG0855:23: ru lu ru lu hum b+h+yo hum /
NG0855:24: kha ram pra ti tsa ho //
NG0855:25: mchod pa 'bul bshags pa bya smon lam gdab phyogs
NG0855:26: bcu mtha' klas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NG0855:27: 'das ye shes sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas
NG0855:28: pa dang */ dpal chen po shri he ru ka
NG0855:29: badzra ta ka ni phyogs kyi dam tshig gi sa
NG0855:30: la bzhes pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang phyi'i grub
NG0855:32: phra men gyi 'khor tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs te /
NG0855:33: rdo rje theg pa srung bar zhal 'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang */
NG0855:34: rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te /
NG0855:35: sprul pa'i sna tshogs su sku bzhes nas slob dpon
NG0855:36: gyi sa la bzhes shing sems can gyi don mdzad
NG0855:37: pa la / bdag cag mched dang lcam dral 'dir
NG0855:38: tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag
NG0855:39: tshul bzhin du byin gyi brlabs nas 'bul bas /
NG0855:40: mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non /
NG0855:41: dam tshig nyam pa thams cad bskang bar gyur nas so so'i thugs dam bskang bar smon no //
NG0855:42: rnal 'byol snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang */
NG0855:43: sgrib pa rnams gnyis ni byang */
NG0855:45: bdag cag gi stongs su gyur cig / bdag cag gis snga slad dam rdzas sgral ba dang */
NG0855:46: sems can gyi srog ku mo 'tshal thams cad kyang
NG0855:47: ye shes ngang gis sgrol zhing rnal 'byor gyi skal
NG0855:48: ba can du gyur cig / bdag cag rnams kyi
NG0855:49: tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi dpon du gyur
NG0855:50: cig pa dang */ rgyud gcig yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la nyes pa phog pa dang */
NG0855:51: bdag gi snying rje chung pa'i rkyen gyis 'phags /
NG0855:52: thugs dam skul ba'i rtsal 'phang dam pa dmag nag pa'i dbang las 'pham par 'gyur ba dang */
NG0855:53: gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen ma bzod de /
NG0855:54: lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas /
NG0855:55: ma yin pa'i chos thams cad dang */
NG0855:56: spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi
NG0855:57: lha dang slob dpon dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
NG0855:58: rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi thugs dam @#/
NG0855:60: dngos grub thams cad 'phrengs bar gyur pa dang */
NG0855:61: mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi mchad pa dang */
NG0855:62: mchod pa yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyud
NG0855:63: mi gcig pa dang bsod nams 'dres pas rtsal tshad
NG0855:65: le lo dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas /
NG0855:66: thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te /
NG0855:67: ye shes lha dang srung ma rnams 'phang par gyur pa dang */
NG0855:68: rgyang 'phen gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bde ba'i yo
NG0855:69: byad dang bral te nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas
NG0855:70: dang */ mchod sbyin thams cad mi chud pa'i sgrib pa dang */
NG0855:71: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bskyed pa las
NG0855:72: phyir mi ldog pa'i sra chung bas the tshom gcod
NG0855:73: pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang */
NG0855:74: shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams rjes su
NG0855:75: dran zhing gnod pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags so
NG0855:76: // bshags sbyang 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang tshor ba'i sgrib pa dang */
NG0855:77: bag chags byang bar smon to //
NG0855:78: gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to //
NG0855:79: lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ji ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang */
NG0855:80: mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par
NG0855:81: gyur cig / skyon ma brjod pa thams cad dang
NG0855:82: bla zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams /
NG0855:83: yon tan tshad ma rnams bzhin thob par gyur cig / de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma btang */
NG0855:84: om shri he ru ka maha badzra ta gi ni nan /
NG0855:85: badzra ke'u ri ha badzra tsi'u ri ha badzra pra
NG0855:86: mo ha badzra be ta li badzra pu ka si
NG0855:88: badzra tsan da li badzra sma sha na badzra he ru ka sa ma yo gi sha ri /
NG0855:90: ru lu ru lu hum b+h+yo hum /
NG0855:91: dbyugs pa brda yis mtshon nas kyang *//
NG0855:92: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
NG0855:93: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
NG0855:94: tha mal brda' yis mtshon nas kyang *//
NG0855:95: bder gshegs kun gyi thugs de byang chub sems kyi don //
NG0855:96: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
NG0855:97: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
NG0855:98: glu yi brda' yis mtshon nas kyang *//
NG0855:99: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
NG0855:100: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
NG0855:101: gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don //
NG0855:102: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i klong dkyil na //
NG0855:103: sku ni dud ka chen po la //
NG0855:104: zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste //
NG0855:105: gnag dang mthing ka dmar ba'i dbu //
NG0855:106: g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni //
NG0855:107: rdo rje dkrug cing zhal du gsol /
NG0855:109: g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni //
NG0855:110: sti ri'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang *//
NG0855:111: thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang *//
NG0855:112: sti ra phra mo gsus pa nas //
NG0855:113: glo snying nang grol 'byin cing za //
NG0855:114: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
NG0855:115: zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs dang *//
NG0855:116: thod rlon 'phreng bas rgyan du byas //
NG0855:117: ma lus pa dag man pas gsol //
NG0855:118: rgyu las byung bas de bzhin gshegs //
NG0855:119: ston @#/  / cing ma nor don mdzad pa //
NG0855:120: mngag pa'i gnas nas yud tsam gyis //
NG0855:121: thams cad kho nar dbang mdzod cig / srungs shigs myur du rnam rgyal dpal //
NG0855:122: thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs //
NG0855:123: rol cig de bzhin gshegs ma ra na //
NG0855:124: ta tha 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim //
NG0855:125: 'byung po khrag ni chang pas zhim //
NG0855:126: 'byung po rus pa mar zhim te //
NG0855:127: thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod //
NG0855:128: dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka / mkha' 'gro yi ni tshogs chen po //
NG0855:129: shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
NG0855:130: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul //
NG0855:131: mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can //
NG0855:132: mi lpags rlon pa gos su gon //
NG0855:133: thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs pa stai /
NG0855:134: khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan //
NG0855:135: phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas //
NG0855:136: lag na tri shu thod pa thogs //
NG0855:137: dus gsum gshegs par dam bcas pa'i //
NG0855:138: rdo rje me dpung 'khrug pa'i thugs //
NG0855:139: re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'i /
NG0855:140: khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
NG0855:141: theg chen rnal 'byor spyod pa yi //
NG0855:142: gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung *//
NG0855:143: thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang *//
NG0855:144: rdul phran bzhin du rlog pa dang *//
NG0855:145: sems nyid theg pa chen po yi //
NG0855:146: rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod //
NG0855:147: rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul //
NG0855:148: dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol //
NG0855:149: nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod //
NG0855:150: ma lus pa dag gnang du gsol /
NG0855:151: rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa /
NG0855:152: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul /
NG0855:154: rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa /
NG0855:155: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul /
NG0855:157: rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro ba'i rgyun gyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa /
NG0855:158: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul /
NG0855:159: ru lu ru lu hum b+h+yo hum /
NG0855:160: rnam pa sna tshogs gcig gi rgyud sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa /
NG0855:161: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul /
NG0855:162: hum e sha hum be sha hum na mo rad na tra ya ya /
NG0855:163: na ma tsan d+ha badzra pa na ye /
NG0855:164: ma ha yak+sha se na pa ta ye /
NG0855:166: sa ma ya a na ya badzra shan ting badzra kro ta ning badzra kro ti badzra nan tam /
NG0855:167: badzra mu sting badzra ti ba ta badzra ga na ting */
NG0855:168: badzra gan d+ha badzra a kring badzra rag k+sha /
NG0855:169: badzra dang stam badzra shwa ting badzra e ka tsa ra ma /
NG0855:170: badzra na mo ha ra ma /
NG0855:173: badzra kri ta badzra mu tring badzra ka ling */
NG0855:174: badzra u tsus ma ma badzra ma ka rang */
NG0855:175: lcag badzra byi rgya tsa ra ni kha kha nu kha tu ta kha sarba @#/  / asta /
NG0855:176: shwa sa kha sarba ma a ka ra sha ye
NG0855:177: pra be sha / ye ban da ya ban ta
NG0855:178: ya / do sha ya do sha ya /
NG0855:179: sarba ta gi ni nan e a ra li ma nu sba ra ya phat /
NG0855:180: mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang */
NG0855:181: khro mo dang ni 'jug sred mo //
NG0855:182: rdo rje 'gug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang */
NG0855:183: gzhon nu ma dang dbang mo dang *//
NG0855:184: rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo //
NG0855:185: zhi ba mo dang tsan pa mo //
NG0855:186: srin mo dang ni za ba mo //
NG0855:187: rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni //
NG0855:188: shin tu khrag 'thung mo gcig pu //
NG0855:189: mo spyod pa dang yid 'phrog mo //
NG0855:190: dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang */
NG0855:191: grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang *//
NG0855:192: rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo //
NG0855:193: me mo phag mo rgan byad mo //
NG0855:194: sna chen mo dang lha mo dang *//
NG0855:196: rdo rje ra ste dmar ser mo /
NG0855:197: rdo rje sngon nag bum sna 'o //
NG0855:198: rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma //
NG0855:199: ma mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
NG0855:200: ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
NG0855:202: ye shes thob par bya ba dang *//
NG0855:203: sgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes //
NG0855:204: rdo rje byin nas ming btags te //
NG0855:205: dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka'i //
NG0855:206: da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams //
NG0855:207: mngon par ston pa sgrub pa phul //
NG0855:208: ci snyed grub mchog ma lus shing */
NG0855:209: khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na //
NG0855:211: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
NG0855:212: 'dug pa las rnams kun gyis shig / a+om pad+ma
NG0855:213: ba da ma mu ka a ra sha ya pra
NG0855:214: be sha ya / pra be sha ya /
NG0855:215: ban da ya ban da ye /
NG0855:216: do sha ya do sha ya /
NG0855:217: badzra ta kri ni hri da ya na /
NG0855:219: gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu snur nas /
NG0855:220: ba dan rta dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya byas la mchod do //
NG0855:221: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las khro
NG0855:222: bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu
NG0855:223: gsum pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
NG0855:224: kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
NG0855:226: zhi ba'i mchog gtan spong ba'i 'phrin las sdus pa tshad med pa'i gzhi ji snyed pa dang */
NG0855:227: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog ste /
NG0855:228: sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya /
NG0855:229: khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni //
NG0855:230: thugs su rtse mo mchog nyid de //
NG0855:231: gsum pa la ni 'das pa'i phyir //
NG0855:232: rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan //
NG0855:233: de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang *//
NG0855:234: bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las so //
NG0855:235: dus dang bdag dang gnas nyid dag / phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste //
NG0855:236: btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes //
NG0855:237: dam tshig bdun po rab tu gsungs //
NG0855:238: 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir //
NG0855:239: rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da' //
NG0855:240: gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyigs la ste //
NG0855:241: lcags dang lcags lnga seng ldeng la sogs pa //
NG0855:242: tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis par byas la /
NG0855:243: mgo mjug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogs su mgo byas la /
NG0855:244: sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdud skyed par sor gcig la rgya mdud stong zur brgyad /
NG0855:245: smad zur gsum du byas la /
NG0855:246: ri @#/  / rab ltar brjid par 'dug pa ni gzugs so //
NG0855:247: byin rlabs ni thog ma nyid du sku gsum du byin brlabs par bya ste /
NG0855:248: de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal med khang du dmigs te phyogs bcur dbus dang ldan /
NG0855:249: hum sgril ma lnga bzhag ste /
NG0855:250: dbus su he ru ka / shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba /
NG0855:251: lhor gshin rje gshed nub na rta 'grin byang du stobs po che /
NG0855:252: 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te /
NG0855:253: phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor ba phul /
NG0855:254: dam tshig rjes su kun gnyis su med pa'i rgyan
NG0855:255: rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur
NG0855:257: de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo skyed pa ni /
NG0855:258: om badzra ki li ki la ya ma ra na phat /
NG0855:260: lte ba yan chad mthing nag la /
NG0855:261: dbus su khang pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng la /
NG0855:263: thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la /
NG0855:264: brang gi sum sdang mig du bgred de /
NG0855:265: phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la gzugs mche ba rtsigs
NG0855:266: pas rab tu rngam pa dur khrod kyi me phung
NG0855:267: gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur
NG0855:268: pa zur gsum pa e'i nang du sum cha tsam
NG0855:269: nub pa la / phyag bzhi pa g.yas kyi go
NG0855:270: ma sta re kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya
NG0855:271: nub pa la / ste / g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs su 'dzin pa /
NG0855:272: g.yon dang pos rdo rje kha dog kha khrol zhing */
NG0855:276: ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa stobs dang mthu la
NG0855:277: sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang mche
NG0855:279: rtag pa chen po zhugs par bstan pa ni sprul pa'i skur byin gyi brlabs so //
NG0855:280: de la rigs ltar byin gyi brlab par bya ste /
NG0855:281: 'bru lngar rnam lngas byin gyi brlab po /
NG0855:282: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
NG0855:283: spyi gtsug tu om rkyed par d+ha'i rtse mo phat bsam mo //
NG0855:284: de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par bya ste /
NG0855:285: de'i 'og zur gsum du phat gsum /
NG0855:286: ngos gsum du hum bzhag go / de nas sku
NG0855:287: bltas pa dang rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad
NG0855:288: kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
NG0855:290: hum hum phat phat kyi sgra 'byin cing de'i sku+u la bstims te /
NG0855:291: dbang dang byin gyi rlabs thams cad brtan par bya'o //
NG0855:292: de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcur bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang */
NG0855:293: sngon thugs dam du zhal du bzhes pa lags pas /
NG0855:294: des stong grogs mdzad cing skul ba la bzhugs pa dang */
NG0855:295: bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas /
NG0855:296: phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir /
NG0855:297: lag pa ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'isteng du hum /
NG0855:298: g.yon pa'i steng du a las @#/  / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du bsam mo /
NG0855:304: 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du gyur pa /
NG0855:305: su ra ta stam zhes brjod pas /
NG0855:306: thal mo mnyam par sbyor la //
NG0855:308: sor mo cung zad bsnol lo //
NG0855:309: om badzra ban d+ha hum zhes brjod pas /
NG0855:310: sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la sdam mo //
NG0855:311: lhung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya //
NG0855:312: sa ma ya stam zhes brjod bas phur pa blangs te tshangs pa'i nang du bcug la /
NG0855:313: lag pa chang ba med la mthe bo dang srin
NG0855:314: lag dang the chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang
NG0855:315: gzhug / the bos cung zad sgul zhing drud do
NG0855:316: // om badzra a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu
NG0855:317: dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas
NG0855:318: pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku
NG0855:319: yung 'bru tsam par mtshams med par phur pa la
NG0855:321: sku gsum thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du
NG0855:322: rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang skur bar bya
NG0855:323: ste / sor mo rgyab tu snol la gung mo
NG0855:324: bzhibs te sgreng ba'i bar du phur ba bcug la
NG0855:325: ste / / a+om badzra sa ta ra tsa hum phat /
NG0855:326: zhes brjod pas bzlas so de nas sor mo pug pug por byas so //
NG0855:327: lag pa'i rting pas phur pa bzung ste a+om hum hri /
NG0855:328: phur bu phat zhes brjod pas /
NG0855:329: de nas so rgyab tu bsnol la /
NG0855:330: mthe bo gnyis bshibs pa'i chang par bcug nas /
NG0855:333: ti pa ta tsakra hum phat /
NG0855:335: bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i
NG0855:336: sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i
NG0855:337: skul stims pas / stong khams gang bar me stag 'phro zhing */
NG0855:338: dmigs pa thams cad phur pa'i 'byin pa dang */
NG0855:340: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par gsol bas /
NG0855:341: yungs kar gyi rgyal pos gdab cing gu gul sbyar
NG0855:342: mas bdugs la phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad
NG0855:344: de nas yid la brnag pa'i phrin las bcol te de'i byin rlabs so //
NG0855:345: bzlas brjod ni bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge
NG0855:346: 'dzin du zhugs la snying kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
NG0855:347: la snying hum / mthing nag po gcig bsams la /
NG0855:348: a+om badzra kro na kro ta ki li ki la
NG0855:349: ya ma ra ya phat zhes brjod pas phur bu'i
NG0855:350: khro bo ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste
NG0855:351: / phyaugs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur bu la bstim mo /
NG0855:354: sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste /
NG0855:355: bsnyen pa rtong ba 'dod na phur bu nyid sny-ing ka la sdu te /
NG0855:357: phrin las ni thog ma nyid du brtag pa'i snyen
NG0855:358: nas bskrad pa'i dang mtshams gcod pa la sogs pa
NG0855:359: byas nas / skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang */
NG0855:361: rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas @#/ / skrad
NG0855:362: nas phur bu bcu khro bo bcur byin gyi brlabs
NG0855:364: ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcod do //
NG0855:365: rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya ste /
NG0855:366: de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas /
NG0855:367: de nas ting nge 'dzin gong mas 'byung ba dang */
NG0855:369: gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te /
NG0855:370: zhing chen gyi thal ba dang skye tse dang zhing chen gyi rag ta srung ma'i lo ma dang */
NG0855:371: khreng dang ju tse dang sum ma dang */
NG0855:372: grog khar gyis dang bung bu'i bdud rtsi la sbrus te /
NG0855:373: zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na til nag po las gzhi blangs gzugs byas kyang rung */
NG0855:374: mi mo byas la mdog smug nag tu bgyis la /
NG0855:375: shug pa la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rag
NG0855:376: tas hum che ge ma ra ya phat ces bris
NG0855:378: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag ste mgo bo lho phyogs logs su bstan te /
NG0855:379: gdon de nyid dgug pa ni mngag gzhug gam khro bo gsum pa ni sbyor ba yang rung ste /
NG0855:380: gsang ba'i thugs ka ma snying kar zla ba'i dkyil
NG0855:381: 'khor gyi steng du dmar po zhig bzhag la dza
NG0855:382: hum bam ho / badzra am ku sha che ge mo zhig hum zhes brjod nas /
NG0855:383: khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa rgyud ma shes pa dag byung bas /
NG0855:384: bgegs kyi snying ka nas bzung ste der 'ongs pa dang */
NG0855:386: che ge mo ma ra sha pra be sha phat /
NG0855:387: ran tsam du brjod la gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang */
NG0855:388: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcing ba dang bsdam pa dang */
NG0855:389: de'i sems dkrugs pa dga' bar byas nas /
NG0855:390: e'i 'og rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam /
NG0855:391: de nas phur ba blangs te las kyi lha mo
NG0855:392: snying po dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad bskul
NG0855:393: la / thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la /
NG0855:394: rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin
NG0855:395: gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril la ting
NG0855:397: ba dan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma rig par gzas la /
NG0855:398: khro bo'i skye ba'am skyed pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste /
NG0855:399: rdo rje tho ba'i sta re ltag pas rdeg cing */
NG0855:400: rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te /
NG0855:401: seng sdeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa zhig snying kar gdab /
NG0855:403: dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab /
NG0855:405: sder mo'i sngags na mahsa man ba ka tsi ta badzra nan /
NG0855:406: a+om ga ga nan ta ya /
NG0855:407: sarba du s+t+ran ma ra ya phat /
NG0855:409: hum hum badzra ki li ki la ya badzra da
NG0855:410: rod ad nya pa ya ti ka ya bag tsi
NG0855:411: ta badzra ki la ya hum phat drag tu brjod
NG0855:412: / phur pa de dag pa zin nas de'i steng
NG0855:413: du lag gi lha phyag rgya sngags kyis mnan te
NG0855:414: / / lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe
NG0855:415: bo mthe'u chung rtse sbyar rkang nas / @#/ /
NG0855:416: bzhin drang por rgyab tu bsgreng ste /
NG0855:417: de'i sngags a+om badzra ka ra kro ta hum phat /
NG0855:418: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te /
NG0855:420: ki la ya'i mgo la lan gsum gtug go / de nas phur pa slar mi dbyung ba dang */
NG0855:421: sus kyang ma phyin pa dang */
NG0855:422: lhag par yang zug cing thal phyin par bsam mo //
NG0855:423: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te /
NG0855:424: sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas /
NG0855:425: gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por sgreng la /
NG0855:427: phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam
NG0855:428: tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgom zhing sngags
NG0855:430: om sarba ta tha ga ta sa ma ya hum phat ces so //
NG0855:431: 'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya stai /
NG0855:432: bsgom pa thams cad nyan par bsam /
NG0855:433: sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te /
NG0855:434: mthe bong dang the'u chung gnyis ngo sbyar la sgreng */
NG0855:435: khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bkyed
NG0855:436: de phur pa'i steng du gnan cing sngags 'di brjod
NG0855:437: do // om badzra kro ta ha na ha na da ha da ha /
NG0855:442: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
NG0855:443: stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
NG0855:444: gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas /
NG0855:445: ci bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin las byed par 'gyur ro //
NG0855:446: yungs dkar gyi rgyal pos brdeg / gug gul sbyar
NG0855:447: mas bdugs la bzhag go / de nas lag pa
NG0855:448: gnyis la sbyar la the'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig
NG0855:449: 'khyud / 'dzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud /
NG0855:450: mdzub mo gnyis kha 'gram la g.yas g.yon du sgreng */
NG0855:451: yid dgug par bya ba lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la /
NG0855:452: 'dzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te /
NG0855:453: rkang pa g.yon pa bgegs kyi snying kar mnan te lan bdun bzlas /
NG0855:454: om badzra kro ta yak+sha kha kha /
NG0855:455: kha hi kha hi hum hum /
NG0855:457: de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
NG0855:458: lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
NG0855:459: mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag / mdzub mo
NG0855:460: gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgrengs nas sdang mig tu bgrad
NG0855:461: de brdeg cing */ sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
NG0855:463: a+om badzra kro ta ma ha ba la ha na
NG0855:464: da ha pa tsa byi dwa na sa ya tsa
NG0855:465: ti ma la bo da ra u tsus ma kro
NG0855:466: ta hum phat / ces brjod do //
NG0855:467: 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig / thugs rje ngang dang shes rab dang *//
NG0855:468: de nas nyungs dkar gyi rgyal po rdeg cing las
NG0855:469: 'di grub cing shin tu brtan par 'gyur bar bcol
NG0855:470: lo // rdo rje brjid gnon gyi phyag rgyas bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya'o /
NG0855:471: khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng
NG0855:472: du hum mthing nag la rdo rje lcags kyu'i rgya
NG0855:473: gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi
NG0855:474: dkyil 'khor gyi yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog
NG0855:475: 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las /
NG0855:476: om badzra su me rta hum swa ya ta zhes @#/  / brjod pa las /
NG0855:477: gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa zhig tu gyur la /
NG0855:478: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu dbu gsum phyag drug pa /
NG0855:479: phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams /
NG0855:480: g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar brtan /
NG0855:481: 'khor dpag tu med pa'i pho brang btab pas khro
NG0855:482: bo rnams kyang shin tu gzir cing mi g.yo ba
NG0855:483: dang las ma grub na skal pa mthar thug na
NG0855:485: phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te bzhag go / yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam /
NG0855:486: gtor ma nag po cha cig bsham ste dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pa dang */
NG0855:487: 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing 'bul lo //
NG0855:488: drag po'i gtor ma cha cig gnod byed de nyid
NG0855:489: bkug te zar bzhugs go / phrin las de'i dus
NG0855:492: srin mo rnams kyang spyan drangs /
NG0855:495: e he hi ba ga ban bya da yak+sha dza /
NG0855:496: b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hum /
NG0855:497: zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drangs /
NG0855:498: pra ti ta ho zhes brjod la gtor /
NG0855:499: a+om sa ma ya a rgam pra ti tsa hum /
NG0855:500: swa ha zhes lan gsum brjod la /
NG0855:501: a mr-i ta phul la las bcol lo //
NG0855:502: dus ni tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la
NG0855:503: nyin mtshan gyi gung du bza' dang sbyar ba dang
NG0855:505: rtags byung ba la sogs te 'di ni dus so //
NG0855:506: gnas ni shing rkang pa dang gnod par nges pa de 'di ni gnas so //
NG0855:507: bdag nyid byang chub la sems gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang */
NG0855:509: lha nye bar gyur pa dang mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang */
NG0855:510: dran cing ltos pa med pa'i sems dang */
NG0855:511: ldan pa dang phrag dog med pa dang */
NG0855:512: gzhan la re ba medapa dang */
NG0855:515: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di las 'di phyung ngo *//
NG0855:516: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang gnan zlog drug tu bka' stsal to //
NG0855:517: zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang thab khung gru bzhi tshang */
NG0855:518: gang thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mtho
NG0855:519: gang zlum po dpang sor gcig 'byim pa'i ma bung
NG0855:520: ba la 'bur du brkos te bzhag / thab kyi
NG0855:521: kha khyer rdo rje ra bas bskor /
NG0855:522: de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bri bkra shis kyi lha mo dang */
NG0855:524: sreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shu dag mar dkar sbrang rtsi 'bras can 'bras thug 'bras yos til /
NG0855:525: zho'i thug pa nas thug nas so ba /
NG0855:527: dro so ba sran ma sha nyungs kar 'bras kyi lag pa na /
NG0855:528: gtor ma dkar po 'bras la bgyi /
NG0855:529: yo byad thams cad dkar pos bris /
NG0855:530: chos gos gos gsum dkar po /
NG0855:531: lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o //
NG0855:532: rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi lha ni
NG0855:533: snga ma'i steng @#/ / du gnod sbyin mo brgyad
NG0855:534: ky-is mnan / pho nya ya 'byung po yo byad thams cad kyang ser po /
NG0855:536: gdang gzar kyang ser po phrugs su bcas pa /
NG0855:538: dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la /
NG0855:539: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed mar bcad pa'i tshul du bya /
NG0855:540: las kyi lha gar gyi dbang phyug dgod /
NG0855:541: sreg rdzas dmar mo'i grangs bzhin du dbul /
NG0855:542: drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'doms gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum /
NG0855:543: zabs su khru phyed grwa gsum du mda' gsum /
NG0855:544: mi'i thod pa gsar rny-ing gis bskor /
NG0855:545: dpal chen po dang khro bcu dgod /
NG0855:546: yo byad thams cad nag po /
NG0855:548: dkyil 'khor yang nag po gtor ma yang nag po /
NG0855:549: las kyi khro bo bcu dang */
NG0855:550: phra men ma chos gos nag po sbyin sreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo //
NG0855:551: a+om shan ting g+han ting ti ka ra pra sha ma ni ra tsa ta /
NG0855:552: a pa ba swa ba ba /
NG0855:553: a mu ka si sa sti shri bam ku ru swa ha /
NG0855:555: ba shang ku ru pu shang ma na ho pu ting ku ru swaha /
NG0855:556: sum ba ni sum ba ni hum /
NG0855:557: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru
NG0855:558: ka rol pa las khro bo mnan zlog gi le'u
NG0855:559: ste bcu bzhi pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan
NG0855:560: 'das kun tu bzang po'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
NG0855:562: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la rdegs pas ru
NG0855:563: cha dgu / dbus su zla ba phyed mar bcas
NG0855:565: de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug / sgo
NG0855:566: bzhi na kham phor ri mo bris pa dgur snang
NG0855:567: ba'i 'od dang bcas pa'i tshul dgram /
NG0855:568: tshil chen dang ni tsi ta'i tog / ras chen
NG0855:569: 'phan gdugs la sogs pa dkyil 'khor rgyan du bri
NG0855:570: bar bya / pa na de'i gnas yol /
NG0855:571: zhing gi rgyal mtshan thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod /
NG0855:572: rag ta dri chen gyi man dal bya /
NG0855:573: yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsags la 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o //
NG0855:574: ngag ma 'dres shing mi gcig la spyod lam yan
NG0855:575: chad tshul ci'i sgo nas sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang
NG0855:576: sna tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo *//
NG0855:577: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po
NG0855:578: nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi btang spyod
NG0855:580: sgrub pa dang */ srid pa gsum gyi sems can
NG0855:581: rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams grol bar mdzad
NG0855:582: pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang */
NG0855:583: spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NG0855:584: de la dang po sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya'o //
NG0855:586: ting nge 'dzin dang lta ba dang */
NG0855:588: phyag mtshan rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gtad par bya'o //
NG0855:589: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs nas /
NG0855:591: lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa 'bul bar bya /
NG0855:592: snying po ni a+om ru lu ru lu hum b+h+yo hum / @#/  / zhes drang ngo *//
NG0855:593: de nas bsnyen legs pa dang */
NG0855:594: yo byad rnams phyi rol tu mi 'byung gnas su
NG0855:595: mi skyel lha dang bdag mchod legs pa'i rjes su
NG0855:596: lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches
NG0855:597: kha bcad la sba bar bya'o //
NG0855:598: don de ltar na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o //
NG0855:599: de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
NG0855:600: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub
NG0855:601: pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
NG0855:605: de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la /
NG0855:606: shar lta stag gi mgo can /
NG0855:608: nub tu seng ge'i mgo can /
NG0855:609: byang du gzig gi mgo can /
NG0855:610: shar lhor pha wam gi mgo can /
NG0855:611: lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can /
NG0855:612: nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can /
NG0855:613: bya shar du skya ga'i mgo can /
NG0855:616: dbus su tse'u ri de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la /
NG0855:617: shar du rmigs pa'i mgo can /
NG0855:618: lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can /
NG0855:620: byang du khu byug gi mgo can /
NG0855:621: mtshams bzhin pha wam gi mgo can /
NG0855:622: khra'i mgo can dang byan lag gi mgo can /
NG0855:623: pho rog gi mgo can rnams sgo bzhir dgod do //
NG0855:626: de'i phyir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo bo can /
NG0855:628: nub tu sbrul gyi mgo can /
NG0855:629: byang du gzig gi mgo bo can /
NG0855:630: mtshams bzhir sre mo'i mgo bo can dred mgo can dang sdig pa'i mgo can dang */
NG0855:631: wa'i mgo can rnams so sgo ba bzhi dgod do //
NG0855:632: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pe
NG0855:633: ta li pad ma 'dab ma bco brgyad drug la
NG0855:634: ye shes kyi khro bo bcu drug dgod do //
NG0855:636: dbus su pu ka si de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can /
NG0855:640: mtshams bzhir yang sprul pa bzhi dgod /
NG0855:641: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kas
NG0855:642: ma ri de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la
NG0855:643: shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma /
NG0855:644: lhor rin chen dbyings phyug ma /
NG0855:645: nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug ma /
NG0855:646: mtshams bzhir phag mgo can la byi la'i mgo can rnams sgo ba bzhi dgod do //
NG0855:647: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su sme
NG0855:648: sha ni de'i phyir rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la
NG0855:649: / shar du sti ra'i gnas nyul ma /
NG0855:650: nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma /
NG0855:651: byang du de byi'i sbyor nyul ma /
NG0855:652: shar lho dam tshig rjes gcod do //
NG0855:653: lho nub tu phyi nang mtshams nyul ma /
NG0855:654: nub byang du dbang phyug ma de'i phyi mtshams bzhir
NG0855:655: rdo rje sgrol nyul ma bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma
NG0855:656: dgongs pa'i drod nyul ma dur khrod gnas nyul ma
NG0855:658: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsan d+ha li /
NG0855:659: pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje sder mo /
NG0855:660: lho ru rdo rje gtum mo /
NG0855:661: nub tu dur khrod bdag mo /
NG0855:662: byang du rdo rje sgrol ma de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang */
NG0855:663: rdo rje teg teg ma dang rdo rje 'dzin ma dang rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang */
NG0855:665: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su seng
NG0855:666: ha mu ka pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la chu srin
NG0855:667: gyi lus la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor
NG0855:669: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bya
NG0855:670: khri mu kha pad+ma 'dab brgyad la kang ka'i lus
NG0855:671: la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor sgo bzhi
NG0855:672: dgod / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la /
NG0855:673: dbus su sri ka mu ka pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
NG0855:674: la seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis
NG0855:677: dbus su sho na mu ka pad+ma 'dab brgyad la
NG0855:678: pho rog gi lus la khyi mgo can brgyad kyis
NG0855:680: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kri
NG0855:681: khya mu ka pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang ka'i
NG0855:682: lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor
NG0855:683: sgo bzhi dgod / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi
NG0855:684: la dbus su kang ka mu ka pad+ma 'dab ma
NG0855:685: brgyad la spyang ki'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor sgo
NG0855:686: sgo bzhi dgod / bzhi dgod / dkyil 'khor 'dom
NG0855:687: gang gru bzhi la dbus su ka ka mu ka
NG0855:688: pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus lapho rog
NG0855:689: gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor ba sgo bzhi
NG0855:690: sgo bzhi dgod / bzhi dgod / dgod / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la /
NG0855:691: dbus su u lu mu ka pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad
NG0855:692: la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags
NG0855:693: pa brgyad kyis bskor sgo bzhi dgod /
NG0855:694: de nas bcom ldan 'das phra men ma'i ting nge
NG0855:695: 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyis don mdzad
NG0855:696: do // bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po
NG0855:697: rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las
NG0855:698: phra men ma sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o
NG0855:699: // // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang
NG0855:700: gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du
NG0855:701: do // zhugs te / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo *//
NG0855:702: sku dang gsung dang thugs las he ru ka / chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs //
NG0855:703: phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang *//
NG0855:704: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NG0855:705: ye shes khro rgyal mang po 'phro //
NG0855:706: phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad //
NG0855:707: las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril //
NG0855:708: ye nas khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NG0855:709: phra men za byed mche gshog 'phar ma'i tshogs //
NG0855:710: dbang phyug 'jug sred yid 'phrog nu ma can //
NG0855:711: rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can //
NG0855:712: phra men za byed ma mo dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NG0855:713: rdo rje yang sprul @#/  / chen mo chos dbyings mkha' las shar //
NG0855:714: mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad //
NG0855:715: rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje las byung phra men yang sprul chen mo dngos grub stsol //
NG0855:716: smon lam grub pa 'gags pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
NG0855:717: 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa //
NG0855:718: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol //
NG0855:719: ye shes chos dbyings skar tshogs zla nyi'i zhal //
NG0855:720: las mdzadaye shes nan tan don la bzhugs //
NG0855:721: rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NG0855:722: sgo ba yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NG0855:723: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum //
NG0855:724: las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma //
NG0855:725: phyag rgya sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad //
NG0855:726: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NG0855:727: rdo rje gshog ma thogs pa yid 'phrog ma //
NG0855:728: rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro //
NG0855:729: rdo rje las byed ma mo rgya yang 'phyed //
NG0855:730: dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol //
NG0855:731: mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni //
NG0855:732: thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal //
NG0855:733: bla med byang chub thob par dam bcas pa //
NG0855:734: bdag las stsol ba'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NG0855:735: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa /
NG0855:736: sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha //
NG0855:737: de'i 'khor du rtogs pa'i lha dang mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0855:738: rtse gcig bsnyen kyang phra men khyed snyen snyen //
NG0855:739: bsnyen pa'i dus na rgyang ma ring *//
NG0855:740: sgrub pa'i dus na mthu ma chung *//
NG0855:741: yang bsnyen ni yang bsnyen na /
NG0855:742: dpal chen phra men ma ltar ma lags kyi //
NG0855:743: lang ka tshogs kyi srin mo yang *//
NG0855:744: pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung *//
NG0855:745: yang sgrubs ni yang sgrub na //
NG0855:746: lang ka tshogs kyi srin mo yang ma bas byams shin sring bas gdung *//
NG0855:747: gdung bas ma tshim tshul de sku //
NG0855:748: ye shes lha yi thugs kyis bzod lags so //
NG0855:749: dngos grub rtsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang *//
NG0855:750: sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol //
NG0855:751: de skad ces gsol ba dang */
NG0855:752: bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs kyis dngos grub mchod rnams la stsal to //
NG0855:753: 'khor rnams rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la dngos grub stsal lo //
NG0855:754: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las sku
NG0855:755: gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig sgrub pa'i le'u ste
NG0855:756: bcu drug pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NG0855:757: kyis bka' dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo
NG0855:758: 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
NG0855:759: las phyung nas / sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis /
NG0855:760: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis thabs dang shes rab gnyis
NG0855:761: kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis mdor bsdus te don
NG0855:762: lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o //
NG0855:764: rgyud ni 'go 'jug gi don dpal kun tu bzang po 'dus so //
NG0855:765: @#/ / kun tu bzang po sku mi zad rgyan
NG0855:767: lo dang thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang
NG0855:768: sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi
NG0855:769: dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus
NG0855:770: so // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang por 'dus pa'i don 'di /
NG0855:771: bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do //
NG0855:772: sku gsung thugs kyi don gzigs pa 'di ni /
NG0855:773: rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do //
NG0855:774: de nas bcom ldan 'das la chos rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos /
NG0855:775: lus ngag yid gsum rjes su yi rang skyes te bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa /
NG0855:776: kun gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NG0855:777: zab cing gting dpag dka' ba sgyu ma'i sku bzhugs pa //
NG0855:778: sprul pa mang pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad //
NG0855:779: dpal chen kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0855:780: ye shes khro bo'i chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs //
NG0855:781: sprul pa'i khro bo sa las rnams rdzogs par mdzad //
NG0855:782: phra men yang sprul ye shes dbyings su 'khril //
NG0855:783: khro bo khro mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0855:784: sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can //
NG0855:785: sku gsung thugs la sprul pa mang po 'phro //
NG0855:786: mkha' 'gro za byed phra men pho nya ma //
NG0855:787: mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0855:788: las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku //
NG0855:789: de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gsang chen rnams //
NG0855:790: klong nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum //
NG0855:791: sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0855:792: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste //
NG0855:793: legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NG0855:794: bka' dam pa gsang pa'i zab mo'i tan tra 'di sdud po rdo rje chos la gtad do //
NG0855:795: de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom
NG0855:796: ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka
NG0855:797: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi
NG0855:799: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pa na //
NG0855:800: lus ngag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:801: rang sems dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:802: thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:803: ma rig log pa'i dbang du gyur pa na //
NG0855:804: yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:805: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:806: lus dang ngag yid sems kyis mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:807: le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:808: sgom dang sgrub la g.yel ba mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:810: mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:811: nga rgyal kheng sems dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:812: slob dpon srung ma ma mnyes mthol zhing gshegs //
NG0855:813: brtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:814: grogs mched thugs dang 'gal ba mthol lo bshags //
NG0855:815: zla grogs ngan @#/  / pa'i dbang du gyur pas na //
NG0855:816: phud dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:817: phud dang lhag ma nyam pa'i skyon dbang gis //
NG0855:818: phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:819: ma dang mkha' 'gro'i bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:820: sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chung ba yis //
NG0855:821: sems can gnas ma gtubs pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:822: nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis //
NG0855:823: badzra kro ti shwa ri la //
NG0855:824: yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:825: sbyor pa'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal bas //
NG0855:826: gzungs ma'i thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis //
NG0855:827: chags shing 'khor ba'i gnas su skye ba mthol zhing bshags //
NG0855:828: dpal chen pad+ma he ru dang *//
NG0855:829: bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol /
NG0855:830: de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste /
NG0855:831: bka' dam 'dis yang nas yang du rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do //
NG0855:832: de nas rdo rje chos kyi bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so //
NG0855:833: de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo *//
NG0855:834: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
NG0855:835: par bstod do / / bcom ldan 'das he ru
NG0855:837: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o //
NG0855:838: // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
NG0855:841: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jigs rten yid rang ste /
NG0855:842: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do //
NG0855:843: gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje'i
NG0855:844: rol pa'i rgyud rdzogs so // // bkra shis par
